Trigger A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you

Requirements You are benefiting from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Twin Parry]{Twin Parry}

A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon. Make a melee Strike or use a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Disarm]{Disarm} action against the triggering opponent.
